name: BeanStalk Siesta
description:
Official Entry For Weekly Game Jam - 171

Theme - Siesta

A Infinite Jumper Game where you have to play as Jack with the following backstory..

Jack had to keep the beans safe for the evening supper but he ended up enjoying a Siesta due to which the birds scattered all the beans everywhere. Now, he has to collect all of them before his mom comes out with a cane stick looking for him and finds out about it.

Tools:

Sound Effects - BFXR
Sprites - Photoshop
Engine - Phaser3

Work:

Programming - Kushagra "negativeProton" Prakash
Design & Concept - Mayank "Maximusprime_909" Srivastava
